ngiemboon: À giŋe kwɔ̀ʼ kwɔ̀ʼ páʼ fòŋ lá.
en: He has an improper gait like that of a cow.
children belonging to the same woman
his wife and mine come from the same concession.

ngiemboon: anzwě wé pɔ́ wɔ̀ɔn fóo tàʼ mbʉ̀a.
anzwě wé pɔ́ wɔ̀ɔn fóo tàʼ mbʉ̀a.
en: his wife and mine come from the same concession.
